ygData.subject: Re: Underwater areas
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Some juicy tidbits from the history files of Norrath are available. Check em out at http://everquest.station.sony.com/e_history.html If you re impatient,
ygData.messageBody:
> Well, remember the place. Did you find the area with another structure
> guards by two ice bones? If you enter it, you will be teleported back out.
> Seems likely to me this is a portal to the (unfinished) dimension of water,
> good thing you will already have Ayre memorized.

Some juicy tidbits from the history files of Norrath are available. Check
em out at http://everquest.station.sony.com/e_history.html

If you're impatient, skip down about 3/4ths of the way till you see the
paragraph that begins:

Under the icy ground of the Frigid Plains, Miragul created a large network
of tunnels and rooms [...]
